mapper.select: SELECT t.*, p.name as parent_name, c.id as child_id, c.name as child_name, c.parent_id as child_parent_id, c.ancestors as child_ancestors, c.order_num as child_order_num, c.status as child_status, c.del_flag as child_del_flag FROM bi_object t LEFT JOIN bi_object p ON p.id = t.parent_id LEFT JOIN bi_object c ON c.parent_id = t.id AND c.del_flag = '0' WHERE t.id = #{id} AND t.del_flag = '0'

SELECT t.*,tobj.weight as standard_weight FROM bi_object t LEFT JOIN bi_template_object tobj ON t.template_object_id = tobj.id where t.parent_id = #{parentId} AND t.del_flag = '0' order by t.parent_id, t.order_num

UNION ALL
